text: Arra koso wa, 7-so no ten to doyo ni (7-so no) daichi o, sozo nasa reta katadearu. (Arra no) o meirei wa sorera no ma kara kudatte kuru. Sorede, hontoni arra wa, subete no koto ni zen'nodeari, mata arra no o chishiki ga, subete no jibutsu o tashikani hoi nasa reru koto o, anata ni wakara seru tamedearu.
